sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
frightens someone
, je nekdo zaradi tistega prestrašen, živčen ali zaskrbljen.

seg.quote: Rats and mice don't frighten me.
The men led their frightened families to safety.
I was frightened of making a fool of myself.
...the most frightening sight he had ever seen.
It is frightening to think what a complete search would reveal.

sense.def:
To frighten someone away
pomeni nekoga prestrašiti, da odide proč in nam ne stori česa hudega.

seg.quote: He waved his torch to frighten away some animal.

sense.def:
To frighten someone into doing something
pomeni nekoga prisiliti, da nekaj stori, tako da ga prestrašimo.

seg.quote: They tried to frighten me into talking.

sense.def:
To frighten a person off
pomeni doseči, da nekdo opusti željo, da bi se zapletel v nekaj.

seg.quote: Cliff was less encouraging, seeking to frighten him off.
